headline: Jim Cramer Praises T-Mobile US (TMUS): “No Price Hikes Yet – Still the Best Deal in Town”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Defended American Superiority and Discussed These 13 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ:TMUS) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed. In his latest appearance on CNBC’s Squawk on the Street, Jim Cramer highlighted the often-overlooked role […]

headline: Should You Buy Warren Buffett's 3 Best-Performing Stocks So Far This Year?
summary: Many investors are anxious these days, with the stock market going topsy-turvy.  The legendary investor is worth billions more now than he was at the beginning of the year, with Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) stock up nearly 16% year to date.  Here are Buffett's three best-performing stocks so far this year -- and whether they're good picks to buy now.
